title: Data Analysis Project-Cricket
description: A project dedicated to analyzing cricket data and visualizing it efficiently. Websites were created using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase cricket rules, calculate statistics, and provide data visualizations.

title: Social Networking Website-Full Stack Web Development Project
description: Developed a social networking website using the MERN stack, allowing users to create profiles, connect with friends, create and share posts, and engage in various social activities.

title: Exploratory Data Analysis of the Titanic Dataset
description: Conducted extensive exploratory data analysis on the Titanic dataset, uncovering passenger survival insights and patterns. This project included data cleaning and preparation for predictive modeling.
